EUMS Alumni Records - Confirmation</h1>

Many thanks for submitting your information!</h6>

This will allow us to keep you informed about upcoming Alumni events and any other news that you may find interesting.</p>

It will also allow us to get a better idea of how our society has developed, and truly understand what has made the society great to members and the general public through the many years it has existed.</p>
